name: Longreach Motor Inn

reviews.text: This is a great motor inn. Located in the heart of town making it a short walk from all services.
reviews.title: Great value and Friendly Service

reviews.text: Nice pool, and fantastic restaurant. The meals were superb.
reviews.title: Wonderful Hosts!!

reviews.text: The rooms very very quiet and the beds in the executive rooms were very very comfortable.
reviews.title: Longreach Motor inn

reviews.text: Staff were extremely helpful and ver friendly.
reviews.title: Nice rooms, great restaurant

reviews.text: Make sure you do not miss the Qantas Museum and ensure you do the 747 wing walk.
reviews.title: Motel is fine, but restaurant is excellent!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The rooms were a good size and very clean in all respects. Staff were very helpful and friendly. Had a great nights sleep and a lovely meal in the restaurant.
reviews.title: Great Motel, Great Restaurant

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My apologies to this motel (see review below), I read my account incorrectly, it was correct and the advertised price included gst. Restaurant was excellent, but not open on the Sunday and Monday nights that we were there, I believe it is normally open. I should have reported the leaking shower, but thought cleaners might have noticed. Overall a very good motel and we enjoyed our stay.
reviews.title: Good Motel in Longreach

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed last weekend for 3 nights in an executive room which was good, however the shower rose leaked, so we had to close the bathroom door. The bed was good.
reviews.title: Good Motel in Longreach

reviews.text: The restaurant food was excellent, but it was only open Saturday night, and barely open in the mornings 6.30 to 8am?? No chance of a sleep in! The room was dark and there were not many areas where you could warm up in the sun. Overall happy with the stay. Note:
reviews.title: great place with wonderful hospitality

reviews.text: prices advertised are GST exclusive so be prepared for the extra 10%
reviews.title: Best Hotel I have stayed in Au

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: What a brilliant weekend escape my husband and I had in Longreach. After visiting Longreach a couple of years ago as a family my husband and I decided that a weekend for two to Longreach would be a different place to go for a weekend getaway. We were not disappointed.
reviews.title: Outback Weekend Escape

reviews.text: We chose to stay at the Longreach Motor Inn after speaking with friends who had stayed there before and had highly recommended it. We were not disappointed. I mentioned in conversation during check in that I had recently hurt my back. The lovely lady at reception offered me a room with a new latex mattress that they had just installed in one of their rooms as a trial. If we liked, we could have that room if it ensured me a more comfortable sleep!! It was beautiful mattress and I slept very well. This service was truly above and beyond what I would have ever expected.
reviews.title: Excellent base in Longreach

reviews.text: We filled our weekend with several activities - the Qantas museum, Longreach Hall of Fame, Thompson River Cruise, a visit to the cemetery (very interesting) and a walk through the town - a must do.
reviews.title: Well organised, visited local attraction and shows, throughtly enjoyed our holiday.

reviews.text: We dined at Harry's Restaurant at the motor inn and were impressed with the quality of the food and great wine list. The restaurant was quiet busy when we arrived for dinner but the service was excellent and the staff very efficient. It was a terrific way to gather with other travellers and share stories.
reviews.title: loved the atmosphere, friendly staff and can't wait to come back

reviews.text: It was a great weekend. We were really well looked after by the staff at the Longreach Motor Inn and I will surely book there again for our next trip to Longreach.
reviews.title: A Queensland Gem

reviews.text: We travelled to Longreach for a sporting event, and decided to stay with this motel. We were very pleasantly surprised to see that the room was so spacious and not squashed in like other motels that we have stayed with. In fact we wished we had more time to stay and enjoy the facilities and hospitality.
reviews.title: What Incredible hospitality - exceeded all expectation

reviews.text: this is a real gem in the qld outback
reviews.title: hidden gem

reviews.text: the staff are really friendly and very proud and knowledgable about their community , always happy to help and advise about places to see and things to do
reviews.title: Best motel and restaurant in Longreach

reviews.text: the rooms are very clean , comfortable , roomy and reasonably priced, i travel a fair bit and i would rate the motel at 4 star , some of the rooms have been recently upgraded to 5 star quality
reviews.title: Great surroundings, quality service, outstanding restaurant
Couldn't have been happier
reviews.text: a real highlight is the restaurant, wonderful food and service

description: Longreach Motor inn is a family owned and operated business with 57 motel rooms including 2 bedroom family rooms. Restuarant, Bar, Room Service, Swimming Pool, BBQ's, Guest Laundries & situated in town. Tour Booking Desk & Information Centre. Experience the real thing! Outback Longreach.
